Name: Amillion
Desc: A million Dennies in one Bangboo.

1.Name: Street Code
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FFFFFF>Cunning Hares</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> DMG increases with fewer enemies in combat, up to a max of 45%.

1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
